elements.title: Marie Goldsmith (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Nestor Makhno described the evolutionary biologist Marie Goldsmith (pictured) as one of the "titans of anarchism"?

elements.title: a house (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a house that was once called "almost the opposite of a landmark" later became a U.S. National Historic Landmark?

elements.title: Smin Maw-Khwin (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that two successive Hanthawaddy commanders who held the title of Smin Maw-Khwin surrendered to Ava forces in 1414?

elements.title: The Patient's Playbook (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that The Patient's Playbook warns against overly hasty medical treatment, citing a case in which a man received heart stents before learning that the issue was in his lungs?

elements.title: Renato Candida (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Renato Candida, not the assassinated general Carlo Alberto dalla Chiesa, inspired the character of Captain Bellodi in The Day of the Owl?

elements.title: his debut solo album (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Geordie Greep announced his debut solo album just ten days after revealing that his band was on an indefinite hiatus?

elements.title: Chris Jackson (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Chris Jackson left the Cancer Society of New Zealand after his wife was elected to parliament?

elements.title: Water World Lloret (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Water World Lloret has been described as "a favourite of foreign tourists", with 60 per cent of its visitors coming from outside Spain?

elements.title: Saint Cyprian Church (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the first Mass for Saint Cyprian Church, a Black Catholic congregation, had only one Black Catholic in attendance?

elements.title: Destination of the Month (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Destination of the Month

Kowloon

One of the most densely populated cities on Earth, Hong Kong's mainland portion offers a culture less influenced by the British than the neighboring Island, plus accommodation, dining, and nightlife are generally cheaper.

elements.title: Off the Beaten Path (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Off the Beaten Path

Andorra la Vella

Andorra la Vella is the capital of a quirky co-principality lodged in the mountains between Spain and France that offers great skiing, hiking, and lots of duty-free shopping.

elements.title: Featured Travel Topic (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Featured Travel Topic

San Diego International Airport

The main airport to America's finest city is the busiest single runway airport in the world.
